name: Dream Weaver
description:
Dream Weaver

Ever have a dream and wonder where that came from? Did my brain concoct this? Am I... okay?
Design a dream and play it through, so you now know these dreams did indeed come from you.

How to player:

WASD - Movement

Hold Left Click to Interact.

Credits:

Programmer - Joe Martin (itch.io) (twitter) (linkedin) 

Programmer - Caleb Bone
